text: @BernieSanders @AOC @IlhanMN @RashidaTlaib @grandson Theoretical way to stop virus in 2 weeks!!!  1.  Quarantine everyone for 2 weeks.  All asymptomatic covid-19 are no longer contagious.   2.  Create covid-19 hospitals by either choosing one in area or retrofit older buildings.  All staff stay on campus.  3.  Testonlydeliveryfood
